action.primary: Invigorates the Blood, cleanses the Blood, regulates menstruation, resolves swelling, removes toxicity and promotes urination

indications: Qi and Blood Stagnation with dysentery, sores and boils, snake and insect bites, traumatic injury, amenorrhea, pharyngitis, rheumatic arthritis and pain

notes: This herb can be soaked in wine or made into pills and powder.
Cortex Kadsurae Radicis (Chinese Redbud) is the correct species for this herb. However Cortex Cercis Chinensis is commonly used.
